Skill.label: inspiration, elemental army, feeding frenzy / mark

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Act 1 : lvl 10 : Withering Step after The Caged Brute Act 2 : lvl 16 : skitterbots lvl 18 : death mark from the spider boss quest Act 3 : lvl 31 : Feeding Frenzy Support and Meat Shield Support for completing A Fixture of Fate (mega gem vendor) Act 4 : lvl 34 : Summon Carrion Golem as a quest reward for the Witch, for completing Breaking the Seal.
Act 1: Enemy at the gate : Raise Zombie + buy Explosive Trap Mercy Mission : Summon Phantasm or Lesser Poison Breaking some eggs : Frost Bomb + Frost Blink The Caged Brute : Added Lightning Damage +Withering Step + Minion Damage Support + Added Cold Damage + Flame Dash (faster race!) The Siren's Cadence : Flesh Offering // storm brand Act 2 : Intruders in Black : Desecrate + Skittle bots Through Sacred Ground : jewel 20 dex + 6% res Sharp and Cruel : Death Mark + Minion Speed + Minion life Act 3: Lost in Love : Convocation + Bane + Punishment + Pride Sever the Right Hand : Raise Spectre + Animate Guardian A Fixture of Fate : Feeding Frenzy + Meat Shield + Vulnerability + Melee Splash + Brutality + Melee phys dmg + Multistrike + Bloodlust + Chance to bleed + Blood Magic + Flesh and Stone + Maim Act 6 : Increased Duration
could go oos until lvl 31-34 frenzy and golem (use heralds and added lightning+added cold) lvl 34 : 4L : 2 golems clear : minion dmg, melee phys, (B-B-R-) 4L : 3 spectres mega clear (flame sentinels have mult proj builtin) : minion dmg, ele focus, conceffect/desc/firepen (B-B-B-B) 4L : 5 zombies : frenzy maim melee splash, (B-B-R-R) skitterbots, convocation, desecrate, flame dash,
could go bloodlust + lacerate for boss or bloodlust + vulnerability curse (6% chance to bleed on bosses -> need 100%/6 = 16.6 hits over 5 seconds. /5s = 3.3hits/s. /2 golems = 1.66hits/s/golem to get 100% uptime bleed) something else for clear (maim, ruthless, etc)
boss : zombie, brutality, minion damage, frenzy, conc effect, bloodlust // impale hard to socket clear : zombie, brutality, minion damage, frenzy, phantasms, maim (B-R-B-B-B-R) temps entre les packs pour recup le cooldown : 2,27s - 0,76 = 1,51s
without multistrike setup : 181k dps (3 attacks, 1 slam en 2,4s) boss : zombie, brutality, minion damage, death mark, bloodlust, multistrike = 825k 3atk 3slam // avec flesh offering : 343k dps en 2,4s // avec flesh offering : 314k dps (3 slam, 2 attacks en 2,28s) // avec bone offering : 269k dps (3 slams, 2 attack en 2,23s) clear : zombie, brutality, minion damage, frenzy, melee phys, melee splash //145k dps (3 attacks, 1 slam en 2,4s) could keep frenzy on bossing rather than deathmark (B-R-B-B-R-R) there's a possibility that multistrike is actually good for clearing because they'll take 1,5s to hit 3 slams which clears a pack, then have 0,67s cooldown remaining
pas besoin de 6L sur l'epee (6L chest zombies, 6L helmet golems)
get decay ward as an annointment or the +1 golem one
things to cast : desecrate zombies / carrions bane curses flesh offering convocation flame dash / phase run bone armour
